alternative_parents.description: Bromophenols carrying a iodine at the C2 position of the benzene ring.
alternative_parents.name: O-bromophenols

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing an acyl moiety of benzoic acid with the formula (C6H5CO-).
alternative_parents.name: Benzoyl derivatives

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing a bromine atom attached to a benzene ring.
alternative_parents.name: Bromobenzenes

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing the acyl bromide functional group.
alternative_parents.name: Aryl bromides

alternative_parents.description: Compounds containing a chemical bond between a carbon atom and a bromine atom.
alternative_parents.name: Organobromides

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing an oxide group.
alternative_parents.name: Organic oxides

alternative_parents.description: Derivatives of hydrocarbons obtained by substituting one or more carbon atoms by an heteroatom. They contain at least one carbon atom and heteroatom.
alternative_parents.name: Hydrocarbon derivatives

class.description: Organic compounds containing a bond between a carbon atom and an oxygen atom.
class.name: Organooxygen compounds

description: This compound belongs to the class of organic compounds known as hydroxybenzaldehydes. These are organic aromatic compounds containing a benzene ring carrying an aldehyde group and a hydroxyl group.

direct_parent.description: Organic aromatic compounds containing a benzene ring carrying an aldehyde group and a hydroxyl group.
direct_parent.name: Hydroxybenzaldehydes

intermediate_nodes.description: Organic compounds containing the aldehyde functional group.
intermediate_nodes.name: Aldehydes

intermediate_nodes.description: Compounds containing an aldehyde group directly attached to an aromatic ring.
intermediate_nodes.name: Aryl-aldehydes

intermediate_nodes.description: Organic compounds containing a benzene ring with a formyl substituent.
intermediate_nodes.name: Benzaldehydes

kingdom.description: Compounds that contain at least one carbon atom, excluding isocyanide/cyanide and their non-hydrocarbyl derivatives, thiophosgene, carbon diselenide, carbon monosulfide, carbon disulfide, carbon subsulfide, carbon monoxide, carbon dioxide, Carbon suboxide, and dicarbon monoxide.
kingdom.name: Organic compounds

subclass.description: Organic compounds containing a carbonyl group, with the general structure RC(=O)R', where R=organyl, R'=H, N, O, organyl group or halide group.
subclass.name: Carbonyl compounds

superclass.description: Organic compounds that contain one or more oxygen atoms.
superclass.name: Organic oxygen compounds
